  filter(!is.na(name)) %>% 
  mutate(passenger_class = factor(pclass,

  geom_violin(aes(fill = passenger_class,),

              colour = NA, 
              show.legend = FALSE) +

  labs(x = "passenger class") +
  coord_flip()
